trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa a linha de paginação em um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> é criado para conter os controles de pager em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface é um marcador que indica que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> controle é parte do <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> hierarquia de controle do objeto.

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de controle podem substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> construtor e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> classe para criar uma linha de pager personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha na coleção <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> construtor chama o construtor de classe base, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, com os parâmetros especificados.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the call is made with `rowIndex` equal to -1, `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType.Pager>, and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: Para uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> controlar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controle, a chamada é feita com `rowIndex` igual a -1, `rowType` igual a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType.Pager>, e `rowState` igual a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState.Normal>.
